item.title: Procedural Smiles - Animating SVG with pure JavaScript
item.description: I recently needed to be able to generate a simple face image, with the face being able to scale from happy to sad. (Why I needed to do this is a long story!) This gave me the opportunity to have a play with SVG, which is something I've not done in a while and always wished I could spend more time with.
